episode_summary: In this episode, Bob Brown, a foundation repair expert, discusses the importance of hiring engineers for foundation inspections to prevent costly repairs and litigation. He explains the impact of different soil types on property foundations and offers practical advice for REALTORS to protect their clients and enhance their services. The episode emphasizes proactive strategies for identifying foundation issues and managing risks in real estate transactions.
